body:
**This PR is based on #14437, so review comments for initial commits should be posted there.**

---

This is a refactoring PR that does not change behavior in any way. This change:

1. Creates an abstract [`Chain`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/blob/pr/wipc-sep/src/interfaces/chain.h) interface in [`src/interfaces/`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/tree/pr/wipc-sep/src/interfaces).
1. Updates wallet code to call the new interface. This largely consists of diffs of the form:

```diff
-    wtx.nTimeReceived = GetAdjustedTime();
+    wtx.nTimeReceived = m_chain->getAdjustedTime();
```

The main exception being commit [`d0af21fab9` Remove uses of chainActive and mapBlockIndex in wallet code](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/10973/commits/d0af21fab95ee453a1fee4242ceb89ca79d568eb), which is also largely mechanical, but is more complicated because it involves getting rid of `CBlockIndex` pointers and replacing them with block heights and hashes.

This change allows followup PR #10102 (multiprocess gui & wallet PR) to work without any significant updates to wallet code. Additionally:

* It provides a single place to describe the interface between wallet and node code.
* It can make better wallet testing possible, because the Chain object consists of virtual methods that can be overloaded for mocking.
